answers.answer: Its not gonna hurt you but it isn't good for you body just same as when you're not pregnant it's very fattening but it wont hurt the baby it can give you Gestational Diabetes
Sweets are no harm to u and your baby. Just dont over do it im sure you dont eat only sweets. A chocolate or donut etc. Here and there should be fine.
As long as your diet isnt all sweets you should be all set! Try and eat healthy and only have sweets for treats!
Sweets are fine in moderation, just as they are when you aren't pregnant. It should be an occasional thing, not a daily one.
